body.title: Lists
body.elms:
```markdown
* Item 1
* Item 2
```

```markdown
- Item 1
- Item 2
```

```markdown
- [ ] Checkbox off
- [x] Checkbox on
```

```markdown
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
```

body.title: Images
body.elms:
```markdown
![Image alt text](/path/to/img.jpg)
![Image alt text](/path/to/img.jpg "title")
![Image alt text][img]
```

```markdown
[img]: http://foo.com/img.jpg
```

body.title: Tables
body.elms:
```markdown
| Column 1 Heading | Column 2 Heading |
| ---------------- | ---------------- |
| Some content     | Other content    |
```

```markdown

--- | ---

```
